channel.title: Two bugs: missing Collisions + getting stuck
channel.description:
Bug 1: [b]The ladder and the vent have no collisions
[COLOR='DarkOrange']map bm_c1a3a @ -1621 x, -650 y, -255 z[/b]
[url=https://www.abload.de/img/2012-09-15_00008hxrfl.jpg][img]https://www.abload.de/img/dsfsdssoor3k.jpg[/img][/url]
Bug 2: [b]Crouching in this corner can get you stuck
[COLOR='DarkOrange']map bm_c1a4c @ -3255 x, -272 y, -473 z[/b]
[url=https://www.abload.de/img/2012-09-15_00005sxkq6.jpg]![](upload://kf6Rfb5jLWqZKTmWHEmqrMe4O3Z.jpeg)[/url]

item.title: Two bugs: missing Collisions + getting stuck
item.dc:creator: Lambda_Core
item.description:
Bug 3: [b]It is possible to look through rock brush/displacement

[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]map bm_c2a5a
@ -2694 x, 3582 y, 1436 z[/b]

Bug 4: Crashing game

[COLOR=‘DarkOrange’]map bm_c2a5f
@ -1442 x, -749 y, 64 z

Read full topic
